Glitch Names

To use the generate function, the name of the glitch that you want must be given to the ‘glitch’ parameter. Below we can see a spectrogram of all X glitches, and the name to be used to generate glitches

“1080Lines”

“1400Ripples”

“Air_Compressor”

“Blip”

“Chirp”

“Extremely_Loud”

“Helix”

“Koi_Fish”

“Light_Modulation”

“Low_Frequency_Burst”

“Low_Frequency_Lines”

“No_Glitch”

“None_of_the_Above”

“Paired_Doves”

“Power_Line”

“Repeating_Blips”

“Scattered_Light”

“Scratchy”

“Tomte”

“Violin_Mode”

“Scratchy”

“Whistle”
